participant_1.name: Alex
participant_1.personality: Adventurous and enthusiastic about trying new things.
participant_1.background: i also like to cook but i am not very good at it. i've been trying all types of food everywhere i go. i have been traveling the world for a years. i own a yacht and i rent it out when i'm not using it. hey there i'm 23 and i love food.

participant_2.name: Sammy
participant_2.personality: Playful and imaginative, with a love for simple joys.
participant_2.background: when i grow up i want to be a dog. i like to look at blocks and sing about letters. i like to eat chocolate candy. i like to talk but people have a hard time understanding.
